parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full path and file name of the Microsoft Excel file to save to ( *.xls )

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to include text in hidden cells, false to not

parameters.name: IncludeFileImages
parameters.description: True to include file images, false to not

title: IBomTableAnnotation.SaveAsExcel
description: Saves this BOM table annotation as a Microsoft Excel document with the specified properties.
signature:
System.Boolean SaveAsExcel( 
   System.String
FileName
,
   System.Boolean
IncludeHidden
,
   System.Boolean
IncludeFileImages
)

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full path and file name of the Microsoft Excel file to save to ( *.xls )

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to include text in hidden cells, false to not

parameters.name: IncludeFileImages
parameters.description: True to include file images, false to not

returns: True if the table is saved as a Microsoft Excel file, false if not
